titlegrp.title: Interactions between humans and urban-adapted marsupials on private properties in the greater Perth region

author.details: School of Veterinary and Life Sciences, Murdoch University, Murdoch, WA 6150, Australia.
School of Veterinary and Life Sciences, Murdoch University, Murdoch, WA 6150, Australia.

front.abstract: This study documents a range of interactions between humans and quenda (Isoodon obesulus) and brushtail possums (Trichosurus vulpecula) in urbanised Perth, Australia. These interactions are of veterinary public health significance. Findings suggest that public education is important to safeguard the health of both the marsupials and humans involved in such interactions.
